targets.expr: avg by(name) (rate(dynamic_consumer_time_cycles{job="${job}", instance=~"${node}"}[$__rate_interval]) / on(instance) group_left() rate(cycles_since_start{job="${job}", instance=~"${node}"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg by(name) (rate(background_task_active_time{job="${job}", instance=~"${node}"}[$__rate_interval]) / on(instance) group_left() rate(cycles_since_start{job="${job}", instance=~"${node}"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg by(index) (rate(api_dispatcher_shard_active_time{job="${job}", instance=~"${node}"}[$__rate_interval]) / on(instance) group_left() rate(cycles_since_start{job="${job}", instance=~"${node}"}[$__rate_interval]))
